mutants.mutated_line: word_list = [i for i in full_list if len(i) > 5 or i.isalpha() or i != 'null' or (i.strip() != '')]
mutants.code:
def filter_words(full_list):
    full_list = [str(i) for i in full_list]
    word_list = [i for i in full_list if len(i) > 5 or i.isalpha() or i != 'null' or (i.strip() != '')]
    word_list = [i.lower() for i in word_list]
    return word_list

mutants.mutated_line: word_list = [i for i in full_list if len(i) > 5 and i.isalpha() and (i != 'null') and (i.strip() != 'MUTATED')]
mutants.code:
def filter_words(full_list):
    full_list = [str(i) for i in full_list]
    word_list = [i for i in full_list if len(i) > 5 and i.isalpha() and (i != 'null') and (i.strip() != 'MUTATED')]
    word_list = [i.lower() for i in word_list]
    return word_list
